text: French Vietnamese or Vietnamese French may refer to: *Of or relating to any of the subdivisions of Vietnam during the period of French colonialism **Annam **Tonkin **Cochinchina *Tây Bồi, a French-based pidgin formerly spoken in Vietnam *French language in Vietnam *Franco-Vietnamese relations *French people in Vietnam *Vietnamese people in France *Eurasian (mixed ancestry) people of French and Vietnamese descent
title: French Vietnamese
